name: Percentage of Users
description: What percentage of users were in this category?

name: Number of Users
description: What total number of users was in this category?

name: UI Variant
description: Which of the six new tab interface designs did the user have?

name: Number of Page Loads
description: How many pages did the user load from the new tab?

name: Number of Domains Visited
description: How many distinct domains did the user open from the new tab?

name: Time Spent on Site
description: After the user loaded a page, how long did they spend there?

name: Load Delay
description: How many seconds passed between the user opening the new tab and loading a page?

name: Page Load Method
description: Did the user load pages from the new tab using the mouse or keyboard?

name: Operating System
description: Was the user on Windows, Mac, or Linux?

name: Firefox Version
description: What version of Firefox was the user running?
